original_text: Whenever the living creatures give glory, honor and thanks to him who sits on the throne and who lives for ever and ever,
korean_text: 그 생물들이 보좌에 앉으사 세세토록 살아 계시는 이에게 영광과 존귀와 감사를 돌릴 때에

sentences.original_text: Whenever living creatures give glory, honor and thanks
sentences.korean_translation: 살아있는 피조물들이 영광과 존귀와 감사를 드릴 때마다

sentences.original_text: to him who sits on throne
and who lives for ever and ever,
